source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a dark forest at night. The camera slowly pans to the right, revealing the trunks of several trees against the pitch-black background. The scene is very quiet and has an eerie atmosphere.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a dark forest at night. The camera slowly pans to the right, revealing the trunks of several trees against the pitch-black background. The scene is very quiet and has an eerie atmosphere.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a deer briefly walks across the foreground as the camera pans, which is not visible in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenery shot of a dark forest at night. The camera slowly pans to the right, revealing the trunks of several trees against the pitch-black background. As the scene unfolds, a deer briefly walks across the foreground, adding to the quiet and eerie atmosphere.
